ygData.subject: UnityNEAT release
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, With the growing popularity of the Unity engine, some of you might be interested in the just released UnityNEAT, a port of SharpNEAT from pure C# 4.0

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Hi all,

With the growing popularity of the Unity engine, some of you might be
interested in the just released UnityNEAT, a port of SharpNEAT from pure C#
4.0 to Unity 4.x (using Mono 2.6), integrated to work with Unity scenes for
evaluation.

UnityNEAT was created by Daniel Jallov (danieljallov@...) as part of
his master's thesis (http://jallov.com/thesis/) at the Center for Computer
Games Research at the IT University of Copenhagen. You can find it here:
https://github.com/lordjesus/UnityNEAT

It also comes with a fun car racing demo that shows how UnityNEAT can be
used to evolve a controller which can drive a car around a track:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHc9u67JPWc&feature=youtu.be

Cheers,
Sebastian

--
Dr. Sebastian Risi
Assistant Professor
IT University of Copenhagen, Room 5D08
Rued Langgaards Vej 7, 2300 Copenhagen, Denmark
email: sebastian.risi@..., web: www.sebastianrisi.com
mobile: +45-50250355, office: +45-7218-5127
